title.native: 戦隊レッド異世界で冒険者になる
title.romaji: Sentai Red Isekai de Boukensha ni Naru
title.english: The Red Ranger Becomes an Adventurer in Another World

description:
Togo Asagaki was the Red Ranger in a heroic Ranger squad. During their final battle against an evil organization, he gave his life to guarantee their triumph. But fate had other plans, and he found himself reborn in an entirely different world. Embracing his new role as an adventurer, he transforms into Kizuna Red and continues his pursuit of justice, helping those in need.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: THE RED RANGER Becomes an Adventurer in Another World

tags.name: Super Robot
tags.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Spearplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of spears in combat.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

tags.name: Desert
tags.description: Prominently features a desert environment.

tags.name: Aliens
tags.description: Prominently features extraterrestrial lifeforms.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Space
tags.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Dungeon
tags.description: Prominently features a dungeon environment.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

node.description: Known to be a fast and efficient worker. Often directing multiple works at a time.
He is a professional screenwriter for anime, drama and theater and is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.
A prolific freelance animator known for working on a large number of shows at any given time.
Veteran animator specialized in effects animation.
Known to be a fast and efficient worker. Often directing multiple works at a time.

__Non-anime roles:__~!
Hyuga/Black Knight in "Seijû Sentai Gingaman VS Megaranger" (live-action special)
Hyuga/Black Knight in "Seijû Sentai Gingaman" (TV)
Hyuga/Black Knight in "Kyûkyû sentai Go Go Five vs Gingaman" (live-action special)
Sasuke/Ninja Red in "Chôriki sentai Ohranger Vs Kakuranger " (live-action special)
Sasuke/Ninja Red in "Ninja Sentai Kakuranger" (TV)!~

[Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=26) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/terblog/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/pinsclub) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/teruaki.ogawa/)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BA%80%E5%B1%B1%E8%80%95%E4%B8%80%E9%83%8E)

Kouichirou Kameyama is a composer and arranger.
